string.value: #b#@1052106:##k in #b#m103000000##k has a simple favor to ask you.
He wants you to hunt 30 #rOctopuses#k that have been pestering him. They can be easily found in #b#m103010000##k.\n\nReport back to #b#@1052106:##k in #b#m103000000##k upon completion.
As requested, you have hunted the #rOctopuses#k that have been pestering #b#p1052106##k in #b#m103000000##k.

Let me tell you about the time I almost died.
I was playing outside when something popped out of nowhere and tried to strangle me. I looked up to see what it was and it was a gigantic #rOctopus#k that wouldn't let me go!

You don't understand how scary it was!

So, it brings me to what I wanted to ask you.
If you go to #b#m10301000##k, you'll see a lot of #rOctopuses#k. You should regulate on them so they don't bother me ever again! Eliminate about 30 of them for me, would you?
You, too, are afraid of the #rOctopuses#k, right?
Have you really eliminated all those scary Octopuses already?\nWow, I feel so safe now!
Thank you. I can go outside and play whenever I want now!
Have you finished hunting all the #rOctopuses#k?
